動物用藥品名稱: 北歐雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎、傳染性華氏囊病不活化混合疫苗
效能(適應症): 預防雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎、傳染性華氏囊病感染。
ingredients: NEWCASTLE DISEASE B1 TYPE LASOTA VIRUS…10^8.8EID50; BRONCHITISVIRUS STRAIN M41…10^6.3EID50; BRONCHITIS VIRUS STRAIN H52…10^6.3EID50; BURSAL DISEASE VIRUS STANDARD LUKERT…10^6.3TCID50;SALINE SOLUTION…0.03ML; OIL ADJUVANT…0.35ML.
